Package it.polimi.se.eliafinazzigrazioli.adrenaline.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ServerRemoteRMI
    Server remote object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractClientHandler
    Represents the joint between the different networks implementations.
    ClientHandlerRMI
    Client handler implementation for RMI connection.
    ClientHandlerSocket
    Handles a single client connected through a socket interface.
    MatchBuilder
    MatchBuilder handles everything that's related to match generation and player dis/re/connection.
    Server
    Singleton class which initializes server-side application.
    ServerEventsConsumer
    ServerEventsConsumer picks events on the queue and notifies them to the right EventController instance.
    ServerRMIManager
    Server rmi manager is the class exposing the remote methods of ServerRemoteRMI.
    ServerSocketManager
    The type Server socket manager.
